General.Name: Mineral Mountain Resources Ltd
General.Description: Mineral Mountain Resources Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in North America. It holds a 100% interest in the Standby gold project comprising 19 unpatented lode mineral claims, located in Black Hills of South Dakota, the United States. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1195 West Broadway, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6H 3X5
